scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p ./models && curl -c cookies.txt -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1C_aDCd-tA96CrSRCOYuTVtUVtgiSLvL2" > /dev/null && curl -b cookies.txt -L "https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1C_aDCd-tA96CrSRCOYuTVtUVtgiSLvL2" -o ./models/my_model.dat && rm cookies.txt
